channel.title: Works on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Works on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: -- C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES Service and UX/UI Design | 2017, Professiona Work Objective After the deregulation, which direction should the electric power company aim for? In 2016, full-scale deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies have entered the electricity market. Chubu Electric Power Company (C-EPCO), a Japanese electricity utility provider for the mid-Chubu region of Honshu island, Japan, must shift to a new paradigm of customer service in order to improve its retention capability.

item.title: MTA Metrocard Redesign
item.description: -- MTA Metrocard Redesign UX/UI Design | 2018, Private Work *This project is still ongoing Objective How might we make NYC’s subway riding experience more comfortable? The NYC metrocard system has remained unchanged for decades and users of NYC subway sometimes have uncomfortable experiences especially the entrance of subway; the lost time of waiting in line to buy a metrocard, touching a dirty machine and so on.

item.title: Uber UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN
item.description: -- UBER UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN UX/UI Design | 2015, Academic Work Objective How can we improve the experience of Uber drivers? Joined 5 weeks MFA Interaction Design Program of User Research Methods in SVA, US. Woriking in teams, we’ve joined a real project with Uber and proposed UX to solve current issues. I’ve learned the fundamentals of user research techniques and the sense of UX in collaboration with global students.

item.title: IBM Watson cognitive enterprise app
item.description: -- IBM Watson cognitive enterprise app Enterprise Application Design | 2016, Professional Work Overview IBM Watson cognitive application We delivered an initial phase of a cognitive Watson Advisor solution using agile engineering approach. MHI engineers can inspect and take action for risks of their projects in advance without long industry experience. They reduced the time taken by the worker’s task by 30% as a result. Clients needs ‘‘innovative and unique UI’’ to show brand-new experience internally, so we experimented various UIs with real users and applied the unique interaction inspired by the cube.

item.title: Collective Juice
item.description: -- COLLECTIVE JUICE Interaction Design | 2018, Academic Work Overview Collect people’s emotions and visualie them as an collective juice Collective Juice is a physical product that collects different user’s emotions and tone together to reveal and visualizes the “mood” of the group/community. Phase Concept, Design, Build, Deliver, Evaluate Period 10/2018 (4 weeks) Team Researcher(Me), Professor Role Researcher Method Iterative Ideation from 1D to 5D

item.title: Organic Sound Visualizer
item.description: Organic Sound Visualizer 1 Day Programming | 2018, Academic Work Concept How might we make the experience of listening music more organic? Phase Concept, Design, Build Period 10/2018 (1 Day) Team Sole Project Role Maker, Coder Method Iterative coding Technology html5, css3, javascript, three.js Output [Link] Demo is here

item.title: LimpiDual Touch
item.description: -- LIMPIDUAL TOUCH Interaction Design | 2009, Academic Work Overview Designed and proposed interactive limpid display with dual-sided touch sensing. LimpiDual Touch is the emerging interactive transparent display. Users can operate from the rear side of the screen while seeing both displayed images and their fingers. This feature resolves a finger occlusion problem. Additionally, it also works for multiple users. Two users can share an identical display from both sides and control displayed objects at one time.

item.title: Human experience for Transhuman
item.description: -- Human experience for Transhuman Speculative Design | 2018, Academic Work | ONGOING Concept XHuman: Educational Headset for transhumans to Experience “Human” in 2075 XHuman is an educational headset for transhumans who inplants superintelligence into their left brain. This gadget stimulates your brain electrically and temporarily stops the neurotransmission between the brain chip and the brain. This feature enables transhumans to think as “Humans”. Since transhuman’s brain chip is implanted in your left brain (work for language, memory, calculation), so be sure to wear it on the left brain.

item.title: FUTURE SUPERMARKET DESIGN INAGEYA
item.description: -- FUTURE SUPERMARKET DESIGN INAGEYA Service Design | 2016, Professional Work Overview Next-Generation Supermarket in 2020 As a facilitator of design thinking, our team designed a 2-days intensive design workshop and created a concept of supermarket of the next-generation. Our concept is that customers and their families can turn their household worries into fun and create their sustainable local communities together. In the last activity, we defined next To-Dos and achieved a consensus beyond all departments of Inageya.
